page.title: 13Rutland Sailing Club.
page.content: Set on the southern bank of Rutland Water are the buildings of Rutland Sailing Club. The club caters for sailing and non-sailing members many of whom travel considerable distance to sail. A number of different classes sail from the club but the only motor assisted craft are rescue boats. The club has been the host to a number of major sailing events. Facilities at the club house include accomodation for residential courses in sailing and also school and youth group visits for environmental and nature studies. The Club maintains a small permanent staff but provides further casual employment at weekends and when club facilities are at high demand.
